problem_names: lemma power_inductl: "z + x \<cdot> y \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> (x ^ n) \<cdot> z \<le> y"
lemma power_inductr: "z + y \<cdot> x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> z \<cdot> (x ^ n) \<le> y"
lemma power_is_relpow: "rel_dioid.power X n = X ^^ n"
lemma rel_star_contl: "X O Y^* = (\<Union>n. X O rel_dioid.power Y n)"
lemma rel_star_contr: "X^* O Y = (\<Union>n. (rel_dioid.power X n) O Y)"
translations: lemma power_inductl: "z + x \<cdot> y \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> (x ^ n) \<cdot> z \<le> y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. z + x \<cdot> y \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> x ^ n \<cdot> z \<le> y
by(induct n, auto, metis mult.assoc mult_isol order_trans)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. class.dioid_one_zero (\<union>) (O) Id {} (\<subseteq>) (\<subset>)
by (unfold_locales, auto)
lemma power_is_relpow: "rel_dioid.power X n = X ^^ n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_dioid.power X n = X ^^ n
proof (induct n)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. rel_dioid.power X 0 = X ^^ 0
 2. \<And>n.
       rel_dioid.power X n = X ^^ n \<Longrightarrow>
       rel_dioid.power X (Suc n) = X ^^ Suc n
case 0

proof (state)
this:
  

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. rel_dioid.power X 0 = X ^^ 0
 2. \<And>n.
       rel_dioid.power X n = X ^^ n \<Longrightarrow>
       rel_dioid.power X (Suc n) = X ^^ Suc n
show ?case

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_dioid.power X 0 = X ^^ 0
by (metis rel_dioid.power_0 relpow.simps(1))

proof (state)
this:
  rel_dioid.power X 0 = X ^^ 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n.
       rel_dioid.power X n = X ^^ n \<Longrightarrow>
       rel_dioid.power X (Suc n) = X ^^ Suc n
case Suc

proof (state)
this:
  rel_dioid.power X n_ = X ^^ n_

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n.

       rel_dioid.power X (Suc n) = X ^^ Suc n
thus ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  rel_dioid.power X n_ = X ^^ n_

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_dioid.power X (Suc n_) = X ^^ Suc n_
by (metis rel_dioid.power_Suc2 relpow.simps(2))

proof (state)
this:
  rel_dioid.power X (Suc n_) = X ^^ Suc n_

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma rel_star_def: "X^* = (\<Union>n. rel_dioid.power X n)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. X\<^sup>* = \<Union> (range (rel_dioid.power X))
by (simp add: power_is_relpow rtrancl_is_UN_relpow)
lemma rel_star_contl: "X O Y^* = (\<Union>n. X O rel_dioid.power Y n)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. X O Y\<^sup>* = (\<Union>n. X O rel_dioid.power Y n)
by (metis rel_star_def relcomp_UNION_distrib)
lemma rel_star_contr: "X^* O Y = (\<Union>n. (rel_dioid.power X n) O Y)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. X\<^sup>* O Y = (\<Union>n. rel_dioid.power X n O Y)
by (metis rel_star_def relcomp_UNION_distrib2)
interpretation rel_ka: kleene_algebra "(\<union>)" "(O)" Id "{}" "(\<subseteq>)" "(\<subset>)" rtrancl

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. class.kleene_algebra (\<union>) (O) Id {} (\<subseteq>) (\<subset>)
     rtrancl
proof

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x. Id \<union> x O x\<^sup>* \<subseteq> x\<^sup>*
 2. \<And>z x y.
       z \<union> x O y \<subseteq> y \<Longrightarrow>
       x\<^sup>* O z \<subseteq> y
 3. \<And>z y x.
       z \<union> y O x \<subseteq> y \<Longrightarrow>
       z O x\<^sup>* \<subseteq> y
